entries.message: We are currently experiencing degraded network performance in our Frankfurt location. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.

Event Type: Service Degraded Performance and Availability

Our Cloud Storage team is investigating a partial outage scenario with our Image and HDD Block Storage infrastructure. The following services may be impacted by this event:

- VPS and Bare Metal deploys
- Snapshots
- Auto-backups
- Custom ISOs
- HDD Block Storage

We are working quickly to restore service to its optimal state.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Warsaw location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2025-07-10 22:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2025-07-11 02:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Warsaw instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
